testcase.classname: Flight Start and End Dates shown
testcase.name: 01 There is a box/area to show Start Date and End Date
testcase.system-out: Given I am a Proteus User...................................................passed And I have the role: Pro Web Campaigns......................................passed And I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser..............................passed When Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"...............................................passed Then The main homepage loads successfully...................................passed When I click on "Campaigns" from home page..................................passed When I search/filter for result with end date...............................passed And Click on Apply button...................................................passed Then Box shown with Start Date and End Date.................................passed And A progress bar shown....................................................passed

testcase.classname: Flight Start and End Dates shown
testcase.name: 02 There is a box/area to show Start Date Indefinite
testcase.system-out: Given I am a Proteus User...................................................passed And I have the role: Pro Web Campaigns......................................passed And I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser..............................passed When Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"...............................................passed Then The main homepage loads successfully...................................passed When I click on "Campaigns" from home page..................................passed When I search/filter for result without end date............................passed And Click on Apply button...................................................passed Then Box shown with Start Date..............................................passed Then End date shown as an icon and Tooltip shown............................passed And A progress bar shown....................................................passed
